name: Peta-Gay Roberts
what_you_do: Sacred-Warrior Transformational Coaching is spirit-centred, and operates under the guidance of The Great Spirit; The Creator Himself, His written Words passed down through the ages and the teachings of the greatest tribal Leader who ever lived, The Great Chief Cornerstone.
who_you_serve: This Sacred Circle is for you if your desire is to: begin to explore a connection with The Creator of the Universe for the first time, develop a deeper, spirit to Spirit, interactive day to day relationship with your Maker, live a more vibrant, abundant, healthy, spirit-centred, purpose-filled and meaningful life, and more.
signature_programs: Sacred-Warrior Transformational Coaching, CUYODA-KAI ™️ Sacred to Signature Sound Mindful MOVE-Meant ™️ Meditation, Pathfinder, Designer, Business Builder
audience_type: individuals seeking spiritual growth and transformation
business_focus: Empowering business owners to get to know their Creator on a deeper level and partner with Him to discover their divine design and remove the internal blocks that hold them back.
